entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
